Summary._: Southbound [2] and [3] trains are running local from 96 St to 42 St because of signal problems at 79 St.

Description._: Southbound [2] and [3] trains are running local from 96 St to 42 St because of signal problems at 79 St.

LongDescription:
Southbound [2] and [3] trains are running local from 96 St to Times Sq-42 St because of signal problems at 79 St. 
Expect delays to [1][2] and [3] train service. 
Our crews are on scene working to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.

Summary._: [A][C] and [E] trains have service changes and delays because of a train with mechanical problems at 50 St.

Description._: [A][C] and [E] trains have service changes and delays because of a train with mechanical problems at 50 St.

LongDescription:
Northbound [A] and [C] trains are running express from Canal St to 59 St-Columbus Circle. 
Northbound [E] trains are stopping along the [M] line from West 4 St-Washington Square to 5 Av-53 St. 
These service changes are because of a train with mechanical problems at 50 St.

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[1] Uptown trains run express from Chambers St to 96 St</b>Late Nights, 9:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Feb 5 - 9    Feb 12 - 16<br><br></font>Trains stop at 14 St, 34 St-Penn Station, Times Sq-42 St and 72 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>Franklin</b>, <b>Canal</b>,<b> Houston </b>and<b> Christopher</b> <b>Sts</b>, take the [1] to 14 St and <br>transfer to a downtown <b>[1] </b>or <b>[2] </b><i>local</i>.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>18</b>, <b>23</b> and <b>28 Sts</b>, take the [1] to 34 St-Penn Station and transfer to a <br>downtown <b>[1]</b> or <b>[2]</b> <i>local</i>.<br><br></font>For service <i>to</i> <b>50</b>, <b>59</b> and <b>66</b> <b>Sts</b>, take the <b>[1]</b> to 72 St and transfer to a downtown <b>[1]</b> or <b>[2]</b> <i>local</i>.<br><br>For service <i>to </i><b>79 </b>and <b>86 Sts</b>, take the <b>[1] </b>to 96 St and transfer to a downtown <b>[1] </b>or <b>[2] </b><i>local</i>.<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [1] or [2] to 72 St, Times Sq-42 St, 14 St or Chambers St and<br>transfer to a Van Cortlandt Park-bound [1].<br><br><b>Note:</b> Downtown [3] trains run <i>local</i> from 96 St to Times Sq-42 St, 10 PM to 11:45 PM, Feb 12 - 15.<br><b><br>
